title: What Is SWIFT, Global Finance Arm That West Can Twist To Hurt Russia - NDTV
content: What Is SWIFT, Global Finance Arm That West Can Twist To Hurt Russia  NDTV
description: Exclusion from SWIFT, a very discreet but important cog in the machinery of international finance, is one of the most disruptive sanctions the West has deployed against Russia for its invasion of Ukraine.
